jobs_results.title: Intermediate Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Intermediate Mobile Developer to join our dynamic development team. As an Intermediate Mobile Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining mobile applications for our company. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality mobile solutions that meet business requirements and enhance the user experience. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of innovative mobile applications and grow your skills in a collaborative environment.

Responsibilities

‚óè Design, develop, and maintain mobile applications for iOS and/or Android platforms, ensuring high performance, responsiveness, and usability.

‚óè Collaborate with the rest of the team to understand requirements, identify technical solutions, and translate them into well-designed mobile applications.

‚óè Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices and coding standards.

‚óè Conduct thorough testing and debugging of mobile applications to ensure they meet quality standards and address any defects or issues.

‚óè Integrate mobile applications with backend services and third-party APIs to enable seamless functionality and data synchronization.

‚óè Optimize mobile applications for performance, scalability, and security.

‚óè Stay up to date with the latest trends and technologies in mobile development and propose innovative solutions to improve the mobile development process.

‚óè Collaborate with the team to identify and resolve technical challenges, provide technical guidance, and share knowledge and best practices.

‚óè Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality, maintainability, and adherence to development standards.

‚óè Assist in troubleshooting and resolving issues reported by users or the support team.

‚óè Document technical specifications, processes, and procedures related to mobile application development.

Requirements

‚óè Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).

‚óè Proficiency in programming languages such as Swift, Objective-C, Java, or Kotlin.

‚óè Strong knowledge of mobile application development frameworks and tools (e.g., Xcode, Android Studio).

‚óè Knowledge of hybrid mobile app development using web technologies (Progressive Web App)

‚óè Experience with cross-platform development frameworks such as React Native, Xamarin, or Flutter.

‚óè Solid understanding of mobile UI/UX principles and ability to translate design specifications into functional applications.

‚óè Experience with APIs, web services integration, and working with backend technologies.

‚óè Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development workflows.

‚óè Ability to write clean, efficient, and well-documented code following coding standards and best practices.

‚óè Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot and debug complex issues.

‚óè Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.

‚óè Self-motivated with a strong desire to learn and stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in mobile development.

Desired (will be considered as a plus)

‚óè Familiarity with backend development languages (e.g., Java).

‚óè Familiarity with OOP design principles and data structures

‚óè Understanding mobile security best practices and techniques.

‚óè Experience with automated testing frameworks and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

Personal Skills We Are Looking For

‚óè Fluency in Greek and English (written and spoken)

‚óè Strong communication and collaboration abilities.

‚óè Excellent analytical, problem solving and troubleshooting abilities

‚óè Ability to work independently and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.

‚óè Solid organizational skills and focus on accuracy and attention to detail

‚óè Detail oriented, maintaining the highest quality work standards

‚óè Enjoy working within agile/scrum-based team

jobs_results.title: Mobile Application Developer (Android)
jobs_results.description:
Are you looking for the next professional opportunity, that will challenge you and advance your career? Join our team now!

Tickmill is looking to hire a Mobile Application Developer (Android) to join our Software Development team.

About Tickmill.

Tickmill is an award-winning, multi-regulated broker offering a wide range of asset classes including CFDs on Forex, Stocks, Indices, Commodities, Cryptocurrencies and bonds, as well as Exchange Traded Derivatives (Futures & Options).

The Tickmill Group was established in 2014, and employs over 270 individuals through its offices in London, Cyprus, Estonia, South Africa and several other regional offices globally.

Our philosophy is based on trust, transparency, and diversity, reflected in both our workplace culture and outstanding customer support. Our employees, a multilingual team of highly skilled professionals from every continent, are the backbone of the company. Their hard work and dedication are what makes it possible to rank among the best in the industry. Tickmill offers a competitive benefits package, hybrid work model, team-building events, and many opportunities for professional growth.

What the job looks like?

The Mobile Application Developer (Android) will have the opportunity to:
‚Ä¢ Design and build applications for the Android platform.
‚Ä¢ Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with internal/external teams to define, design, and ship new features.
‚Ä¢ Identify, correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
‚Ä¢ Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.
‚Ä¢ Stay up to date with new mobile technology trends, applications, and protocols.

What will you need to be able to do the job?
‚Ä¢ Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
‚Ä¢ Minimum 3 years of proven experience in Android development in either Java or Kotlin.
‚Ä¢ General knowledge of the Google Play release procedures.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency with Android Studio and Android SDK tools.
‚Ä¢ Experience using RESTful APIs to integrate mobile applications to server-side systems.
‚Ä¢ Good understanding of Android release cycle and familiarity with CI/CD.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with mobile product and design lifecycles.
‚Ä¢ Experience with various testing tools and code versioning tools.
‚Ä¢ Excellent analytical, and problem-solving skills with both developers and product members.
‚Ä¢ Proficient in English language with excellent written and verbal communication skills.

It will be considered as a plus if you have:
‚Ä¢ Experience with agile development methodologies.
‚Ä¢ Experience within the financial markets Industry on a similar IT field.

By joining us, you can expect:
‚Ä¢ A Unique Opportunity for a career in a global, fast-growing company.
‚Ä¢ Attractive remuneration package based on qualifications and experience (including 13th salary and Discretionary Bonuses to reward exceptional performance).
‚Ä¢ Opportunities to learn and grow through our ‚ÄúEmployee Training & Development program‚Äù.
‚Ä¢ Medical Insurance Cover, which includes Outpatient, Inpatient, and Dental Care.
‚Ä¢ Multiple events to bond with the team and the group through Quarterly/Semestrial Team Activities for all the Company.
‚Ä¢ Participation in our welfare investment and savings plan through our Provident Fund Scheme.
‚Ä¢ Birthday and Loyalty benefits.

Make your next Career step and apply NOW!
‚Ä¢ Due to the great number of applications, we receive for each of our open vacancies, we are unable to respond on an individual basis

jobs_results.title: Mobile Application Developer - React Native
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a React Native developer interested in building performant mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms. You will be responsible for architecting and building these applications, as well as coordinating with the teams responsible for other layers of the product infrastructure. Building a product is a highly collaborative effort, and as such, a strong team player with a commitment to perfection is required.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.
‚Ä¢ Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.
‚Ä¢ Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.
‚Ä¢ Reach out to the open source community to encourage and help implement mission-critical software fixes‚ÄîReact Native moves fast and often breaks things.
‚Ä¢ Maintain code and write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality.
‚Ä¢ Transition existing React web apps to React Native.

Skills
‚Ä¢ Working Knowledge In React Native
‚Ä¢ Firm grasp of the JavaScript, TypeScript language, and its nuances, including ES6+ syntax
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of object-oriented programming
‚Ä¢ Ability to write well-documented, clean Javascript code
‚Ä¢ Rock solid at working with third-party dependencies and debugging dependency conflicts
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Gradle, Android Studio, IntelliJ
‚Ä¢ Understanding of REST APIs, the document request model, and offline storage

jobs_results.title: Sr. Android Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Fingerprint empowers developers to stop online fraud at the source.

We work on turning radical new ideas in the fraud detection space into reality. Our products are developer-focused and our clients range from solo developers to publicly traded companies. We are a globally dispersed, 100% remote company with a strong open-source focus. Our flagship open-source project is FingerprintJS (20K stars on GitHub).

We have raised $77M and are backed by Craft Ventures (previously invested in Tesla, Facebook, Airbnb ), Nexus Venture Partners (previously invested in Postman , Apollo.io, MinIO , Druva) and Uncorrelated Ventures (previously invested in Redis, Rollbar &Gradle ).

Who We Are Looking For: We are looking for a Senior Android Engineer with a solid background in Information Security. The ideal candidate will have experience building Android applications or libraries from scratch and will be skilled in security frameworks, cryptography, and network protocols. The role requires strong expertise in Kotlin, and familiarity with Jetpack Compose is preferred.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and optimize native Android applications and libraries, focusing on security, scalability, and performance.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement security protocols and ensure that applications align with best security practices.
‚Ä¢ Build developer tools that enhance productivity and streamline the development process.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to the maintenance and advancement of security frameworks for mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Provide mentorship to junior team members and contribute to their technical development.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Education: Degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or equivalent experience.
‚Ä¢ Experience:
‚Ä¢ 5+ years as a Senior Android Engineer (prior experience in a Senior Android role is required).
‚Ä¢ Strong Information Security background, with practical experience in:
‚Ä¢ Network protocols and secure coding practices
‚Ä¢ Cryptography and security framework development
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in building Android applications from the ground up, with expertise in Kotlin and vanilla Android SDKs. Experience with Jetpack Compose is preferred.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Android NDK is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Contributions to Open Source projects on GitHub are a bonus.

Offers vary depending on, but not limited to, relevant experience, education, certifications/licenses, skills, training, and market conditions.

Due to regulatory and security reasons, there‚Äôs a small number of countries where we cannot have Fingerprint teammates based. Additionally, because Fingerprint is an all-remote company and people can join our workforce from almost any country, we do not sponsor visas. Fingerprint teammates need to be authorized to work from their home location .

We are dedicated to creating an inclusive work environment for everyone. We embrace and celebrate the unique experiences, perspectives and cultural backgrounds that each employee brings to our workplace. Fingerprint strives to foster an environment where our employees feel respected, valued and empowered, and our team members are at the forefront in helping us promote and sustain an inclusive workplace. We highly encourage people from underrepresented groups in tech to apply.

If you are applying as a resident of California, please read our CCPA notice here

If you are applying as a resident of the EU, please read our GDPR notice here

jobs_results.title: Android Engineer (Platform Team)
jobs_results.description:
, Limassol

We're seeking an Android Developer, who will expand the product metrics linked to the increased number of transactions in the app. The team is made up of Android, iOS and backend developers, QA testers, UX/UI designers, and data analysts.

Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams on feature design, system architecture, and shipping new features

‚Ä¢ Ensure code quality through unit testing and code reviews

Qualifications

‚Ä¢ Experience with flutter.
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of Java and Kotlin with proficiency in the Android SDK, frameworks, and design principles

‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of OOP, SOLID principles, and design patterns
‚Ä¢ Experience with RESTful APIs, third-party libraries, and cloud message APIs including push notifications

Conditions & Benefits

jobs_results.title: Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Greece

On behalf of our client, a global leader in the production and distribution of a wide range of established nutritional supplements and cosmetic products, we are seeking experienced Flutter Developer to join their new IT Hub in Greece. The company's headquarters are located in Germany, with a subsidiary in Athens, and the IT teams work fully remotely from anywhere in Greece.

A day in the life of a 'Flutter Developer'

The company has developed two internal products: a web and a mobile application, through which it manages all its internal processes while also supporting its partner network, which consists of approximately 3,000 partners. The web application is built using Java/Spring Boot microservices and Angular, while the mobile application is developed with GO and Flutter, supporting both Android and iOS platforms. Based on your expertise in using Flutter, you will join one of the sub-teams, contributing to the development of the company‚Äôs products through the conception, design, and implementation of business solutions.

Your day-to-day
‚Ä¢ Conception, design and implementation of business solutions in the area of digital customer solutions for our sales partners
‚Ä¢ Development and support of iOS and Android applications with a high degree of innovation for our partners
‚Ä¢ Strategic planning and implementation of front-end development projects
‚Ä¢ Taking responsibility for the coordination and control of troubleshooting as part of incident management and ensuring the operation of the developed solutions of the developed solutions
‚Ä¢ Use and continuous optimization of agile development processes and corresponding tool stacks
‚Ä¢ Ensuring software quality by implementing unit tests, expanding End2End tests in test automation and the support of integration tests
‚Ä¢ Technical support in requirements management with regard to feasibility analyses, development and further development of systems
‚Ä¢ Designing data models, interfaces and authorization concepts with the system managers and specialist departments
‚Ä¢ Responsibility for results and realization of the desired solutions with a focus on the needs of the customers/stakeholders and compliance with the company processes (business process and data flow via the existing business applications)

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Completed studies in computer science, business informatics or comparable training
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in the conception and development of multi-tier software architectures in the Flutter/Dart environment
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of mobile development for Android and IOS
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in dealing with tools for collaboration in the development team (Git, Jira, Confluence, SonarQube) and automated deployment/integration of applications (CodeMagick, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of common and cloud databases such as Postgres, MySQL, Azure Cosmos DB
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of build management and continuous integration
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of the Microsoft Azure DevOps environment is a plus
‚Ä¢ Basic application-related knowledge of interfaces (REST, sockets) and protocols (AMQP, TCP, UDP) will be considered as an asset

Benefits

What‚Äôs in it for you

You will have the opportunity to work in a motivating and multicultural environment working on a global scale projects and using latest technologies. Additionally, you will enjoy the following benefits:
‚Ä¢ Attractive remuneration package plus performance related reward
‚Ä¢ Intellectually stimulating work environment
‚Ä¢ Customized training plan

This offer from "iTechScope" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 72% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Mid-Level Software Engineer - Mobile Applications (Swift & Kotlin)
jobs_results.description:
Who we are

At Moveo.AI, we‚Äôre creating exceptional conversational AI experiences that engage millions of users worldwide. Our mission is to merge leading-edge technology with authentic human interaction, and we‚Äôre proud to collaborate with top-tier partners such as Kaizen Gaming, Skroutz, and Allianz European Reliance.

Join our innovative team of skilled professionals as we push the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible in the tech industry. If you‚Äôre passionate about mobile application development and excited to contribute to game-changing projects, we want to hear from you!
About the role

We are looking for a Mid-Level Software Engineer with proficiency in mobile app development, specifically in Swift and/or Kotlin. In this role, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain high-quality mobile applications/SDK that provide seamless user experiences.

Your expertise in mobile technologies will help us create robust, reliable applications that resonate with our customers. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and are eager to be part of a dynamic team, this is the perfect opportunity for you!

Join us if you are excited to
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain mobile applications for both iOS (using Swift) and/or Android (using Kotlin) platforms.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with UI/UX designers to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and ensure adherence to coding best practices.
‚Ä¢ Participate in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on optimization, continuous delivery, and improvement.
‚Ä¢ Stay updated with the latest industry trends and advancements in mobile technology.
What you bring to the team
‚Ä¢ 2+ years of experience in mobile application development with a focus on Swift for iOS or Kotlin for Android.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in building and deploying mobile applications on the App Store and Google Play.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of mobile development paradigms, design patterns, and lifecycle management.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with RESTful APIs and third-party libraries integration.
‚Ä¢ Good communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
‚Ä¢ A portfolio of relevant mobile applications or projects showcasing your skills is a plus.

Why You‚Äôll Love Working at Moveo.ai

‚Ä¢ Join us, not just for a job, but for a thriving journey!

jobs_results.title: Java Android Software Engineers - Financial Technology Solutions and Payments
jobs_results.description:
Euronet seeks to employ dynamic and passionate Java Android Software Engineers with experience in mobile development, to embark on an exciting journey with us!

The successful candidates will play a pivotal role in developing and maintaining applications for our cutting-edge payment terminals.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
‚Ä¢ Design and develop Android applications for payment terminals using reusable and reliable JAVA code.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
‚Ä¢ Implement secure and efficient payment processing solutions.
‚Ä¢ Debug and resolve software defects and issues and optimize application performance.
‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviewing activities.
‚Ä¢ Utilize Git for version control and collaboration.

Requirements
‚Ä¢ University Degree in Information Technology or a related academic field.
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 3 years of professional software development experience with Java and Android.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of banking and/or financial systems will be considered a plus.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in software design principles and architectural patterns.
‚Ä¢ Experience with secure coding practices.
‚Ä¢ Excellent knowledge of Git for version control.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Android Studio for application development.
‚Ä¢ Ability to apply Android UI design principles to create intuitive interfaces.
‚Ä¢ Fluency in Greek & English, both verbal and written.
‚Ä¢ Eligible to work in the EU on full-time permanent basis without the need of employer sponsorship.

COMPETENCIES:
‚Ä¢ Self-driven, self-motivated and ability to work independently as well as in a team.
‚Ä¢ Attention to detail and results oriented with strong problem-solving skills.
‚Ä¢ Ability to own and drive tasks/assignments while collaborating with peers and other technology teams.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy building knowledge of financial products and concepts.
‚Ä¢ Ability and readiness to work in nationally and geographically diversified teams.

Benefits
‚Ä¢ Work in a dynamic, stable, international environment.
‚Ä¢ Excellent career prospects within a dynamic and multinational organization with leading position in the market and ambitious expansion plans.

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Mobile Developer with experience in Flutter to build high-quality mobile applications. The ideal candidate should be proficient in developing cross-platform applications that work seamlessly on both iOS and Android. You will work closely with our product and design teams to create engaging and efficient user interfaces, ensuring smooth and reliable performance.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Develop, test, and deploy high-quality mobile applications using Flutter for both iOS and Android platforms.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while following best practices.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement modern and intuitive designs.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize applications for performance, speed, and scalability.
‚Ä¢ Integrate third-party libraries and APIs to extend the functionality of the applications.
‚Ä¢ Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and Flutter updates to continuously improve your skills.
‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to peers to maintain high code quality.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in an agile environment with cross-functional teams including product managers, designers, and other developers.
‚Ä¢ Ensure that applications follow security and data protection best practices.

Required Skills and Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Proven experience as a Mobile Developer with strong knowledge of Flutter.
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of Dart programming language.
‚Ä¢ Experience with both Android and iOS mobile platforms.
‚Ä¢ Experience with integrating RESTful APIs and working with third-party libraries.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of mobile app performance optimization techniques.
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: 2,000.00‚Ç¨ - 4,000.00‚Ç¨ per month

Experience:
‚Ä¢ Flutter: 2 years (Required)
‚Ä¢ Mobile Developer: 2 years (Required)

Application Deadline: 06/01/2025
